titleStmt.title: God the father glorified: and the worke of mens redemption, and salvation finished by Iesus Christ on earth. Opened in a sermon before the Right Honorable the Lord Major, and the Right Worshipful the sheriffes, aldermen, and recorder, of the Citie of London, the second day of the tenth moneth (called December) 1649. / By Vavasor Powell, a willing (though weake) labourer in Christs Vine-yard in Wales.
titleStmt.author: Powell, Vavasor, 1617-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Sumptner, for Hannah Allen, at the Crowne in Popes-Head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
